item.title: Iran Begins to Evacuate Military Officials and Personnel From Syria
item.description: The withdrawals by one of President Bashar al-Assad’s key backers come amid a resurgent rebel offensive.

item.title: Trump Still Faces 8 Civil Lawsuits Over the Jan. 6 Attack
item.description: Donald J. Trump has successfully defeated or impeded many legal challenges against him over the storming of the Capitol, but eight lawsuits on the mat...

item.title: Man Who Kidnapped Woman From Bloomberg’s Colorado Ranch Gets 22 Years in Prison
item.description: Joseph Beecher was intent on killing the media mogul and inquired about his family before taking a housekeeper hostage, officials said.

item.title: Is Milk Safe? Your Questions About Bird Flu and Dairy, Answered
item.description: Federal officials will soon begin testing the country’s milk supply for the virus. Here’s what to know.

item.title: Iran Accelerates Production of Near-Bomb-Grade Uranium, IAEA Says
item.description: The United Nations chief inspector says production has quadrupled. But it is not clear whether Iran is trying to touch off a crisis or gather bargaini...
